item.title: Reader Monads and Dependency Injection
item.description: After writing an article about the Writer Monad, it only seems fair that I write another one about the Reader Monad. As with the Writer article, my main support will be the Scala with Cats Underscore Book freely available online. I’ve also decided to put more effort into my examples and have them answer a real life problem. So in this articles’ examples, I’ll attempt to answer a common life question: “Can I become friends with x person”.
